sentences.sContent: A long placard bore the names of all the new recruits.
sentences.sContent_eng: A long placard bore the names of all the new recruits.
sentences.sCn: 长长一张布告上写着全部新兵的名字。

synos.tran: 张贴，悬挂；公布；张贴公告于

trans.tranOther: a large notice or advertisement on a piece of card, which is put up or carried in a public place
